description: Consider problem of placing N queens on an n X n board so that each queen attacks precisely 1 other. Sequence gives maximal number of queens.
comments: 2*[2n/3] is an upper bound for a(n), which is achieved for n=2, 4 and 6-14. - _Jud McCranie_, Aug 12 2001
references: Martin Gardner, The Last Recreations, Copernicus, NY, 1997, 274-283.
author: Robert Trent (trentrd(AT)hotmail.com), Aug 23 2000
